name: deddy.dbmanager
title: Brackets DB Manager
description: A brackets extension to querying a database server, now only support SQL server, other database will follow. Now it's only offer basic functionality, like browse databases, tables, show table fields, show table data in a paging table, run query. Changelog on this update: database views, bug fix for table paging, etc. Please click read more to learn how to use it. Thanks
